Variable.Name: offset
Variable.Comment: Correzione della temperatura ricevuta dalla sonda

Variable.Name: riscaldamento
Variable.Comment: TRUE se la stanza richiede calore

Variable.Name: DiffLeft
Variable.Comment: Differential to the left of the setpoint (extreme included)

Variable.Name: DiffRight
Variable.Comment: Differential to the right of the setpoint (extreme included)

Variable.Name: Reverse
Variable.Comment: If true, the function is reverted
